name: Ultimate Hamster
description:
You love hamsters so much that you think they are the best pets? You think you can easily take it with other pets and destroy them?
Then Ultimate Hamster is just the game for you. Thanks to an invitation to the Ultimate Pet Tournament, you can now prove that hamsters are equally superior to fish, birds, cats and dogs and are at the top of the pet chain.
This tournament is about using training sessions to turn your little sweet hamster into a muscular fighting machine so that he can beat his opponents unconscious in a boxing match. But do not overdo it. Even a hamster does not have infinite stamina. If the exhaustion value is exceeded, the hamster loses all its training progress.
Do you have what it takes to bring the hamsters the title of Ultimate Pets?

Ultimate Hamster is a clicker game for android.

Game-Design / Story / Sound: Roman Reiser

Art:  Roman Reiser 

Programming / Android-Setup:  Roman Reiser

Special Thanks : Niklas Haßmann for supporting and helping with the code
